card.name: Swallow the Impenitent
card.text: This spell costs {2} less to cast if you've descended this turn. (You descended if a permanent card was put into your graveyard from anywhere this turn.) Target nonland permanent's owner puts it on the top or bottom of their library.

card.name: The Underworld 666
card.text: 1 — Surveil 1. 3 — Draw a card. 5 — Create a 3/3 black Demon creature token with flying. You lose 3 life. 7 — Choose all the above.

card.name: Devoured by Vermin
card.text: Destroy target creature. Journey into the Underworld. (Enter the Underworld if you haven't already, then put a damnation counter on it.)

card.name: Descent through the Abyss
card.text: (As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it.) When Descent through the Abyss enters the battlefield and whenever a defense counter is removed from it, it deals 1 damage to any target you don't control, then you journey into the Underworld. (Enter the Underworld if you haven't already, then put a damnation counter on it.)

card.name: Celestial Strike
card.text: Exile target permanent. Create an X/X green Hydra creature token, where X is that permanent's mana value. If you didn't control that permanent, the token enters the battlefield tapped with X stun counters on it. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)

card.name: Lieve, Noonday Witch
card.text: Whenever you lose life for the first time during each of your turns, put two loyalty counters on Lieve, Noonday Witch. [+1]: Journey into the Underworld. (Enter the Underworld if you haven't already, then put a damnation counter on it.) [-5]: Destroy target permanent. [-9]: Target player loses 2 life, exiles a card from their hand, and exiles a permanent they control. Repeat this process for each card type among cards in graveyards.

card.name: Harrowing the Depths
card.text: Penance {2}{R}{R}{G}{G}{W}{W} (If you cast this for its penance cost, replace all numbers in brackets with the greatest power or toughness among your creatures.) For each creature card in your graveyard, create a token that's a copy of that creature, except it's [b][1][/b]/[b][1][/b] and has haste and lifelink. Sacrifice those tokens at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Leviathan, Heart of Sin
card.text: When Leviathan, Heart of Sin enters the battlefield, journey into the Underworld. (Enter the Underworld if you haven't already, then put a damnation counter on it.) Unless you've journeyed into the Underworld seven or more times, Leviathan is an artifact and isn't a creature. Otherwise, it has flying, indestructible, and "Leviathan's power and toughness are each equal to the number of times you've journeyed into the Underworld."

card.name: Infernal Pseudomonarch
card.text: You may cast permanent spells with unearth from exile. Spells you cast this way cost an additional "Pay 2 life" to cast.

card.name: Ghazuz, the Whispered End
card.text: Menace White spells your opponents cast cost {W} more to cast. The same is true for blue and {U}, black and {B}, red and {R}, and green and {G}.

card.name: Effigy of Desire
card.text: When Effigy of Desire enters the battlefield, exile target permanent. At the beginning of your end step, if you descended this turn, create a token that's a copy of the exiled permanent. (You descended if a permanent card was put into your graveyard from anywhere this turn.)

card.name: Cliffs of Spite
card.text: ({T}: Add {G} or {U}.) Cliffs of Spite enters the battlefield tapped. When Cliffs of Spite enters the battlefield, target player mills two cards.

card.name: Greater Tormentor
card.text: Menace Whenever one or more creatures with the greatest power among creatures you control attack, create a token that's a copy of one of those creatures, except it's a black Demon and is tapped and attacking. Sacrifice that token at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Hellmarch Reaver
card.text: Hellmarch Reaver has vigilance as long as there is a white card in your graveyard or among cards you own in exile. The same is true for ward {1} and blue, menace and black, haste and red, and +1/+1 and green.

card.name: Pilloried Titan
card.text: Each nonland card in your graveyard that's a creature, an Aura, or that has an activated ability with {T} in its cost has unearth. The unearth cost is equal to its mana cost. (Pay the card's mana cost: Return it to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Penitent's Plate
card.text: Trample Penitent's Plate enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each creature card in your graveyard. When Penitent's Plate dies, distribute its counters among up to two target creatures you control.

card.name: Primal Lorekeeper
card.text: Flying When Primal Lorekeeper enters the battlefield, exile up to one creature card and up to one noncreature card from your graveyard. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.

card.name: Perfect Hatred
card.text: Menace Whenever a permanent card enters your graveyard from anywhere or leaves your graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on Perfect Hatred.

card.name: Kharus, Wretched Ferryman
card.text: If one or more cards would be put into an opponent's graveyard, that player may have you create a Treasure token. If they don't, exile those cards instead and that player loses 1 life for each of those cards. {T}: Each opponent mills a card.

card.name: Depths of Kytos
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color. {X}, {T}: Depths of Kytos becomes a copy of target nontoken creature you control with mana value X. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Deepest Reaches
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {5}, {T}: Create a 1/1 red Devil creature token. Activate only as a sorcery. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each time you've journeyed into the Underworld.

card.name: Relic of Enmity
card.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Return target noncreature permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Calumny Collector
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Calumny Collector: Search your library for a basic Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Recidivist Ritualist
card.text: Penance {3}{W} (If you cast this for its penance cost, replace all numbers in brackets with the greatest power or toughness among your creatures.) When Recidivist Ritualist enters the battlefield, you gain [b][2][/b] life.

card.name: Soulherder Anchorite
card.text: {2}{W}, Exile Soulherder Anchorite from your graveyard: You gain 1 life and draw a card.

card.name: Ichorborn Shrike
card.text: Whenever a permanent card leaves your graveyard, Ichorborn Shrike gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Lurking Nehustan
card.text: Flash When Lurking Nehustan enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life and scry 2.

card.text: You may cast this spell as though it had flash as long as two or more creatures are attacking you. Flying

card.text: Accursed Crusader has double strike as long as it's attacking.

card.text: Flash When Grafted Cenobite enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature you control.

card.name: Keeper of the Circles
card.text: Vigilance Keeper of the Circles can't be blocked by Demons or Devils.

card.name: Apprentice of Menaus
card.text: Vigilance When Apprentice of Menaus enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls and put two stun counters on it. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)

card.name: Predatory Grotesque
card.text: Flying Predatory Grotesque has ward {2} as long as it's untapped. (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)

card.name: Banishing Rite
card.text: Penance {1}{W} (If you cast this for its penance cost, replace all numbers in brackets with the greatest power or toughness among your creatures.) Banishing Rite deals [b][3][/b] damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

card.name: Lost to Pride
card.text: When Lost to Pride enters the battlefield, exile another target nonland permanent until Lost to Pride leaves the battlefield. Unearth {1}{W} ({1}{W}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Exile it at the beginning of the end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Grip of Kytos
card.text: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or blocking creature.

card.name: Wrath
card.text: When Wrath enters the battlefield, destroy all other creatures, then put a +1/+1 counter on Wrath for each creature destroyed this way.

card.name: Unleash the Damned
card.text: Penance {1}{W}{W}{W} (If you cast this for its penance cost, replace all numbers in brackets with the greatest power or toughness among your creatures.) Look at the top seven cards of your library. Put any number of creature cards from among them with total mana value [b][3][/b] or less onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Tamer of Grotesques
card.text: As Tamer of Grotesques enters the battlefield, note your life total. Lifelink At the beginning of your upkeep, if your life total is greater than or equal to the last noted life total for Tamer of Grotesques, create a 1/1 white Gargoyle creature token with flying. Then note your life total.

card.name: Profligate's Progress
card.text: Penance {3}{W}{W} (If you cast this for its penance cost, replace all numbers in brackets with the greatest power or toughness among your creatures.) Create [b][X][/b] 1/1 white Gargoyle creature tokens with flying.

card.name: Abandon All Hope
card.text: Target player can't cast noncreature spells this turn. Until end of turn, nonbasic lands enter the battlefield tapped. Draw a card.

card.name: Salvation's Shadow
card.text: Flying, vigilance If a creature entering the battlefield causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time. Creatures dying don't cause triggered abilities of permanents your opponents control to trigger.

card.name: Procession of Souls
card.text: Spells cast from graveyards cost {2} more to cast. Activated abilities of cards in graveyards cost {2} more to activate.

card.name: Shadow of Purgation
card.text: Destroy up to six hundred and sixty-six target nonland permanents.

card.name: Envious Knave
card.text: Double strike When Envious Knave attacks, if defending player has more cards in hand than you, put a +1/+1 counter on Envious Knave. The same is true if they control more lands than you and if they control more creatures than you.

card.name: Withered Proudblade
card.text: Discard a card: Tap Withered Proudblade. It gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Arbiter of the Dead

card.name: Thought Scour
card.text: Target player mills two cards. Draw a card.

card.name: Frantic Inventory
card.text: Draw a card, then draw cards equal to the number of cards named Frantic Inventory in your graveyard.

card.name: Avarice

card.name: To Know Is to Know Sin
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card or sacrifice a creature. Draw two cards. If a creature was sacrificed to cast this spell, journey into the Underworld. (Enter the Underworld if you haven't already, then put a damnation counter on it.)

card.name: Judgment of Menaus
card.text: Destroy target artifact or land. If an artifact was destroyed this way, journey into the Underworld. (Enter the Underworld if you haven't already, then put a damnation counter on it.)

card.name: Better to Reign
card.text: As long as you control a creature with power 4 or greater, you may cast this spell as though it had flash. Better to Reign deals 5 damage to any nonplayer target.

card.name: Pride
card.text: When you control another creature, sacrifice Pride. Protection from mana value 3 or less (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything with mana value 3 or less.)

card.name: Lust
card.text: Lust attacks each combat if able. At the beginning of combat on your turn, untap up to one target creature you don't control. When you do, until end of turn, if that creature or Lust would deal damage, it deals triple that damage instead.

card.name: Hellrider
card.text: Haste Whenever a creature you control attacks, Hellrider deals 1 damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.

card.name: Wastrel's Progress
card.text: Penance {3}{R}{R} (If you cast this for its penance cost, replace all numbers in brackets with the greatest power or toughness among your creatures.) Exile the top [b][X][/b] cards of your library. You may cast any number of spells with mana value [b][X][/b] or less from among them without paying their mana costs.

Creatures you control get +[b][1][/b]/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: 666 Draft Archetypes 666
card.text: {W}{U} CONTROL The underworld is yours to dictate. Carve out your heinous throne. {U}{B} UNDERWORLD CREATURES Traverse the dark circles of Bocacius in search of sin. {B}{R} HELLSPAWN Gather Demons and Devils to rule the damned. {R}{G} FEROCIOUS In the freezing depths of the underworld, true strength is all that matters. {G}{W} PENANCE TOUGHNESS Repent your sins by embracing your endurance. {W}{B} UNEARTH Dig foul magicks and relics from the infernal muck. {B}{G} UNEARTH The restless damned cry out for a second chance. {G}{U} DESCEND Reach deep into the abyss and find power. {U}{R} UNDERWORLD SPELLS Sinful magicks secure your place in the underworld. {R}{W} PENANCE POWER Might makes right. Purge your guilt through a strong offense.

card.text: ({T}: Add {U} or {R}.) Crossroads of Grief enters the battlefield tapped. When Crossroads of Grief enters the battlefield, target player mills two cards.

card.name: Slough of Despair
card.text: ({T}: Add {B} or {G}.) Slough of Despair enters the battlefield tapped. When Slough of Despair enters the battlefield, target player mills two cards.

card.name: Spirit Wall 666
card.text: Defender

card.name: Collector of Faces
card.text: When Collector of Faces enters the battlefield or dies, look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

card.name: False Seer
card.text: When False Seer enters the battlefield, journey into the Underworld. (Enter the Underworld if you haven't already, then put a damnation counter on it.) As long as you've journeyed into the Underworld four or more times, False Seer gets +1/+1 and can't be blocked.

card.name: Scourge 666
card.text: You can't draw cards {2}, {T}: Destroy this artifact.

card.name: Gargoyle 666
card.text: Flying

card.name: Shield of Smoke and Fire
Reaper across Time
card.text: Flying When Reaper across Time enters the battlefield, exile up to one target creature, up to one target card from an opponent's graveyard, and up to one card from an opponent's hand. Return the exiled cards to their owners' hands when Reaper across Time leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Embrace Damnation
card.text: At the beginning of your postcombat main phase, mill X cards, where X is the number of cards in your graveyard. You may cast a spell from among the milled cards without paying its mana cost.
